  • Constructor Details

    • ClientHandler

      public ClientHandler​(java.net.Socket clientSocket, int clientID)
      Constructor for the following object which will be managed by the ServerGameThread. (PlayerHandler contains all the information necessary for the Server and the SGT to correctly manage the interactions with the Client (connection closure included))
      Parameters:
      clientSocket - client' socket
      clientID - client's ID
